pages.title: Transmogrifying Gear
pages.text: When you roll an $(l)unidentified vault gear piece$(), it discovers the transmog (look) of the item. $(br2)Every transmog you identify will be available serverwide to yourself inside the transmogrification table. $(br)
Use the transmogrification table to transmog one of your gear pieces together with $(l)vault bronze$() to any of your unlocked transmogs.
